name: Amazon - Super Clean
description:
Most ads removed, lots of useless junk hidden, and spacing cleaned up

*NOTE: The differences are subtle and hard to see in a screenshot, but they greatly enhance the Amazon experience.  Give it a Preview and see if you like it.
additional_info:
This is version 1.0. 

It's been tested on Firefox 53.0.2. 

Pages affected: Wish List, Product Pages, Shopping Cart, Search Results, and Homepage (a little)

discussions.name: Mistakenly removes body content on promotion detail pages
